trans-unit.source: Supports mappings between .NET Framework types and XML Schema data types.
trans-unit.target: Dá suporte a mapeamentos entre tipos do .NET Framework e tipo de dados do Esquema XML.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMapping> class is the base class for the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping> and <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMembersMapping> classes.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMapping> classe é a classe base para o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping> e <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMembersMapping> classes.

trans-unit.source: It supports built-in and custom XML schema data types, plus SOAP encoding (Section 5 of the SOAP 1.1 specification).
trans-unit.target: Ele dá suporte a tipos de dados de esquema XML internos e personalizados, além de SOAP codificação (seção 5 da especificação do SOAP 1.1).

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMapping> exposes no public or protected members.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMapping> não expõe nenhum membro público ou protegido.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMapping> class instead of deriving a class directly from <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMapping>.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMapping> classe em vez de derivar uma classe diretamente do <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMapping>.

trans-unit.source: Get the name of the mapped element.
trans-unit.target: Obter o nome do elemento mapeado.

trans-unit.source: The name of the mapped element.
Gets the namespace of the mapped element.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o namespace do elemento mapeado.

trans-unit.source: The namespace of the mapped element.
A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that contains the lookup key.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.String" /> que contém a chave de pesquisa.

trans-unit.source: Sets the key used to look up the mapping.
trans-unit.target: Define a chave usada para pesquisar o mapeamento.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the XSD element of the mapping.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o nome do elemento XSD do mapeamento.
